properties.name: 1 Room in Berlin Center with Artist
properties.space: Located in the heart of Berlin, the arty rooms is with 140 x 200 cm double bed ( pict GUESTROOM), in a very colorful, clean and cozy designer apartment. Shared living kitchen and a shared bathroom are provided usable. The apartment is in the perfect location to explore, to Berlin. Easy walk to Museum Island, Alexanderplatz, the German Historical Museum, Volksbühne Theater, the Maxim Gorky Theatre, the State Opera, Humboldt University, Berlin Cathedral and many other sights. In the immediate surroundings you will find many restaurants, bars, cafes, shops and shopping for daily needs. Amenities: 2x bedroom, ca.15qm (double bed without limitation, mattresses: the 140x200), carpet floor, desk, closet, TV, stereo, DVD / CD player, WiFi Bathroom (toilet / bath with shower / toilet / washing machine) towels. Kitchen (microwave / grill, hob, fridge, toaster, electric kettle). Comfortable sofa for breakfast. Hall -wardrobe with full length mirror and shoe rack. ...and please take of your shoes

properties.house_rules: what you break...you have to pay for it! always lock the front door and the windows when you leave. please be nice and quiet when you had a wonderful party and come home late at night. please leave the wet towels on the heater in the bathroom. it dry faster and my furniture don't realy likes to get wet ;-)
properties.host_about:
Ich freue mich darauf Euch in meiner Wohnung zu begrüßen. Bei Fragen könnt ihr Euch immer gerne an mich wenden.
Gregor "Marvel" (Designer und Künstler)
zog 1991 aus Frankfurt / Main in den frischen Bereich Ost-Berlins/Mitte und arbeitete seitdem als Kostüm- Bühnenbildner und Grafiker für viele Museumsausstellungen, Musikvideos, Performer und Fashionlabels. Er studierte Interieur und Grafik Design.
Da er nicht ohne Musik leben kann, ist alles was er in den jeweiligen bereichen erschafft, immer von und mit Musik entstanden.
Seit 2003 leitet er die FriendlySociety, eine Galerie-Fashion-Design-Salon mit zwei Musiksalonabenden im Monat und seiner eigene Designlinie. Im Moment ist er durch seine neuesten Kreation, dem Berliner Dirndl in der Presse sehr bekannt. Sein nächsten Projekte ist eine BarrockFashionOperaShow im Frühling, eine neue Modeedition, eine Design-Onlineshop sowie eine Modenschau im September in NYC... das wird bestimmt sehr aufregend :-)

properties.name: Peaceful Penthouse - Berlin Mitte
properties.summary: My place is very quiet and relaxing despite being in the middle of the city.  Nearby are buses to Tegel Airport and the Hauptbahnhof main train station. Museums, sites like the Bundestag & Brandenburg Gate and the Tiergarten park are all close. The best parts of the Prenzlauer Berg and Mitte neighborhoods are a very short walk away.  My place is especially good for solo explorers, runners and business travelers - everyone is very welcome.
properties.space: The flat is a duplex penthouse at the top of a building. There is a spiral staircase connecting the dining room with the reading area and bathroom upstairs (I also sleep  on the upper level). You're welcome to explore and enjoy the whole flat!

properties.neighborhood_overview: Three Michelin stars within a 5 minute walk. This is a very special location right near the Wall and some of the best parts of the city.
properties.notes: The bed is a very comfortable day bed that I use as a guest bed. It's 70x 200 cm and very cosy with the bedding I have for guests.
properties.transit: All public transportation is nearby -- many trams, buses, both subway systems (S-bahn and U-bahn).
properties.access: The guest room is your private space, and you're welcome to hang out any place you like: breakfast table in the kitchen, the dining room, upstairs in the armchair beneath the skylights.
properties.interaction: I'll be very happy to help anyone with tips about Berlin and find anything they need. When guests stay longer, sometimes I introduce them to friends.
properties.house_rules: Just commonsense: be tidy and respectful. If anything seems unsure, please don't hesitate to ask me any time :)

properties.name: Feel the City
properties.summary: Perfectly located right at the Berlin Wall Memorial & Exhibition Centre this stunning apartment offers all you need to explore one of the most vibrating cities is the world. The loft style apartment is bright, airy and fully equipped. Enjoy a glass of wine on the beautiful terrace after seightseeing or before experiencing the best night life in Europe. Come and feel the city the entire world is talking about!

properties.name: Light apartment in Prenzlauer Berg
properties.summary: This modern apartment is situated in Prenzlauer Berg, only minutes away from the famous Berlin Wall Memorial at Bernauer Strasse. The apartment has high ceilings and a lot of daylight. Enjoy the modern kitchen and bathroom.
properties.space: This modern apartment is situated in the middle of Prenzlauer Berg, only minutes away from the famous Berlin Wall Memorial at Bernauer Strasse. Catch a Berlin breakfast around the corner in one of the many cafes or go shopping in the many boutiques in Mitte! The space is uniquely located: a quiet and green neighbourhood in between the Mauerpark and Arkonaplatz, so enjoy the famous flea market and karaoke at Sunday. Tram M10 (direct connection to Berlin Hauptbahnhof) is just a one-minute walk and the U-Bahn (U8) is five minutes away.

properties.name: Spacious apartment with a nice view
properties.summary: Located near Alexanderplatz, and at the edge of the vibrant student area of Friedrichshain, this apartment is ideal for active Berlin visitors. The trendy district of Kreuzberg and Prenzlauer Berg are in close proximity and are reachable within a few minutes with the public transport. Outside the door there is both a tram, and a subway stop from which you can comfortably tour the whole city. At the same time the special outlook to the towers of Frankfurter Tor (former Stalinallee) gives a special tranquility and grandeur.
properties.space: The apartment can accommodate up to 5 people and has a double bed and two sofa beds that can be distributed through the rooms according to the needs of the guests. Each sofa bed can be divided into two mattresses, that means, 5 people can sleep separately from each other.  Rooms are spacious. There is a large closet and several empty shelves where guests can place their personal items. The apartment, with its views and the details therein, is very nice for a couple looking for a cozy and intimate space, as well as for a larger group, as the rooms offer ample space. The kitchen has all the necessary elements to cook, a big refrigerator, toaster, as well as basic things like salt, oil, coffee, tee, milk and pasta. There is also a very good functioning washing machine (a Miele).
properties.description: Located near Alexanderplatz, and at the edge of the vibrant student area of Friedrichshain, this apartment is ideal for active Berlin visitors. There is a large closet and several empty shelves where guests can place their personal items. The apartment, with its views and the details therein, is very nice for a couple lo
properties.neighborhood_overview: The district is very lively, full of cafes, restaurants, bars and shops. Everything you need is nearby: Bike rental for 10 € / day, sauna, etc. It's a real pleasure to walk through the neighborhood. This neighborhood was in the past next to the Berlin Wall. On the other side of the Wall (and the river) was the west neighborhood of Kreuzberg. The only long rest of the Berlin Wall  left is very near the apartment.  How to get there: Eastside Gallery - The Berlin Wall Take the M10 to Warschauer Strasse tram. If you walk in the same direction as the tram, in the next street cross at the right side you will see the longest piece of wall preserved. Many artists have painted over it. Try to access the beach through the hotel Eastside. There you will see new graffiti and will enjoy the river Spree.  Second hand clothes:  The store Humana is in the same Frankfurter Tor in front of the apartment building, probably the largest store of secondhand clothing around Berlin (according to the largest w
properties.notes: The building of the apartment is a historical monument. It was built in the 50s together with the avenue Karl Marx Allee (in the past called "Stalin Allee") . In the GDR it was a very significant and monumental avenue. The building has a special glamor of spy movies of the Cold War.
properties.transit: There is a great connection with the public transport:  Frankfurter Tor U-5, (in front of the house)  Tram M10 & M21 (in front of the house)  The apartment has 2 bikes that you can rent for 8 €/ day or 50 €/ month. Behind the house there are parking lots.
properties.access: The apartment has a lift so that you don't have to load your luggage the way up to the apartment! The most apartments in central Berlin do not have elevator. The heating is central, functions very well and it is very easy to use (this is also exceptional in Berlin). There is also Wifi access. In addition there is cable television (German/english). In the bathroom there are towels available, laundry soap and bath gel. In the kitchen I always like to have coffee, oil, salt and sugar, teas, some pasta, enough food to survive one afternoon without going out. There are also two bicycles  that you can rent for a better price than in the bike rental places. There is a children playground next to the entrance of the building. You have access to it without having to cross any street.
properties.interaction: I'm happy to interact with my guests, to communicate about their plans and interests and to help them to have a better stay. If the guests want more privacy and less contact, I respect it of course. Please be respectful of the neighborhood: do not leave trash or bottles on the landing, in places that use other neighbors, and please respect the sleep of others, do not make noise after 21 h.
properties.house_rules: The most important rule is not to bother the neighbors, preventing them from their sleep, do not listen to load music in the night. Si algo se rompe, por favor, compren el mismo objeto y remplacenlo. Si hay un problema con la televisión, internet, lavadora, nevera, u otro equipo por favor díganoslo inmediatamente para que podamos repararlo al momento. Por favor, no espere hasta el último día para decírnoslo. ¡Muchas gracias! Por favor, hagan lo posible para no fumar en el apartamento. ¡Los siguientes huéspedes se lo agradecerán!
properties.host_about: Soy una persona tranquila y cálida. Me gustan los espacios amplios, las buenas vistas, los colores vivos, la buena comida. Adoro los viajes a lugares lejanos, el encuentro con personas de otras culturas, las charlas relajadas. Como anfitriona me gusta crear un espacio agradable donde los huéspedes se sientan a gusto e introducirles en Berlín y Madrid, mis dos ciudades.

properties.name: Bright + Modern room in Mitte
properties.summary: You will love our modern apartment and your bright room! The location is ideal since its in the middle of Mitte (touristic attractions) and Kreuzberg (hip and original) - Metro stations are only minutes away. We love our guests, to feel at home.
properties.space: You will have your own room with a double bed and and a shared bathroom. You are welcome to chill out on our living room and even cook with us and have a glass os wine. The apartment is located in the area of Kreuzberg and only a block away from Oranienstrasse where you can find many restaurants and bars.  As you will notice in the pictures the apartment is modern and bright. The room is also bright and contains a queen size bed, with big window overlooking the park. You would have a shared bathroom with a shower and a bathtub, you are more than welcome to use our big living room, our cosy dining area and our kitchen. The space is separated from a modern cubic that was custom made for us.

properties.neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a very authenitc neighbourhood but very close to the touristic part of Berlin. The Kreuzberger Oranienstrasse is just a block away and you will find many small shops and restaurants from all over the world. In front of the house there is a long park and a small lake overlooking the Berlin Television Tower, where you can have a coffee and relax.
properties.notes: On your initial contact with us, please tell us more about your self, with who you are travelling with and what is the purpose of your trip. We would love to know more about our guests
properties.transit: METRO - Two lines on walking distance from the apartment - Station: "Moritzplatz" is 6 minutes walking / Line U8 - Station: "Kottbusser Tor" is 8 minutes / Line U1 BUS - Station: "Oranienplatz" 3 minutes walk / Line M 29 takes you to City center west We love it because this line crosses the city and you can have a taste of Berlin
properties.access: Our guests can have a coffee from our coffee machine and use the grill on our balcony
properties.interaction: Since we both work, we see our guests only in the morning or in the evening. We are happy to have a morning coffee with our guests or an evening wine. Whenever the time permits, we like to cook for ourselves and our guests are welcome or if would like to cook for us we will not say no. If we are not in the mood for cooking, we can even go to a restaurant. Our home is not a hotel and we love interacting with our guests
properties.house_rules: - Please leave your shoes in the entrance - we prefer to keep the house clean - Smoking is alowed only in the balcony - If you want to invite someone, please inform us first - No parties - Resepct our neighbours - After using out lovely kitchen please keep it clean aftrwards - male guests sit down to pee
properties.host_about:
We are a German / Italian couple and we love to travel around the world and meet new people. We love the beach and the mountains, and if they are combined with a beautiful town, then its a paradise! We recently discovered our passion for hiking and whenever we have the chance, we plan a trip!

We are vegetarian and we cook almost every day. We mostly cook italian and german but we are experimenting the flavours from south america and other parts of the wold. We are both in the fashion business, Udo is a designer and Davide in sales.

We are excited to open our door to new guests, share stories and enjoy a glass of wine. On our travels we love to meet our hosts and see the city from their eyes!

properties.summary: Our house is near the famous areas Friedrichshain, Kreuzberg, Berlin-Mitte and Prenzlauer Berg. 15-30 mins to each from our house.  We offer you a brand new and modern accommodation.
properties.space: Its a brandnew house with garden and pool. We are a couple and a fun flatmate. We are friends offering some nice chat and a great accommodation.

properties.house_rules: - Sauberkeit - Rauchen draußen auf der Terrasse oder vor dem Haus möglich - No Partys. Wir wohnen auch dort, weshalb wir wir Euch bitten bei uns Zuhause keine Partys zu feiern.
properties.host_about:
Wir sind Semmy (28) und Matthias (33). Wir freuen uns Euch als Gäste bei uns zu haben. Wir reisen sehr gerne und sind immer für einen Spaß, Bars und Feiern zu haben wenn wir Zeit haben. 

Ich (Matthias) bin Selbständiger Webdesigner und Onlinemarketing Berater. Mit mir werdet Ihr die meiste Zeit Kontakt haben. 
Zu mir: Sport & Kitesurfern, Reisen und das positive im Leben sehen.

Wir sind sympathisch, umgänglich und Zuhause auf Sauberkeit bedacht.   Was sollen wir noch sagen?

properties.name: Beautiful flat in Neukölln/Kreuzberg
properties.summary: The apartment is well connected to public transport and situated directly by the river. When you look outside the window there is nothing but trees. Its calm and quiet. Yet the street is paralle to the Weserstraße, which is well known for its active nightlife, bars, cafés, shops and restaurants. You are in Neukölln, not far from Kreuzberg so there is a lot to explore! This place is perfect for couples, single travellers and good friends.
properties.space: The flat is cosy with high ceilings, very clean and bright. The street is quiet and the neighbours are really friendly.

The flat is cosy with high ceilings, very clean and bright. The street is quiet and the neighbours are really friendly.
properties.host_about:
I love to travel and prefer staying in private places. So I hope you feel comfortable and welcome and find what you need in order to enjoy your time in Berlin. 
I am a very easy going and friendly person. In my free time I sing, dance, cook, practice Yoga, hang out with my friends, read... travel! 
For work I run a project that I have founded with some friends a year ago. It is related to the basic income movement and supports unemployed people. What would you do if your income was taken care of?

properties.name: Gemütliches Zimmer mit Bad + Küche
properties.summary: Kürzlich renovierter Gästebereich mit Badezimmer sowie einer kleinen Küche. Durch eine separate Tür ist Privatsphäre garantiert. Hier buchst Du ein Einzelzimmer. Das Bett kann ausgezogen werden und bietet dann zwei Personen Platz (z.b. 2. Kinder) Wir vermieten auch noch ein Doppelzimmer, mit welchem Bad und Küche geteilt werden. Wir wohnen nicht in einer Partygegend. Es ist ruhig bei uns. Der Müggelsee ist nicht weit weg. In die City Ost braucht man mit der Bahn ca. 40 Minuten (Alexanderplatz).
properties.space: Die Unterkunft liegt im zweiten Obergeschoss. Es gibt keinen Aufzug (2 Treppen zu steigen). Köpenick ist der größte und grünste Stadtbezirk Berlins. Wir sagen: auch der schönste ;-)
properties.description: Kürzlich renovierter Gästebereich mit Badezimmer sowie einer kleinen Küche. Durch eine separate Tür ist Privatsphäre garantiert. Hier buchst Du ein Einzelzimmer. Das Bett kann ausgezogen werden und bietet dann zwei Personen Platz (z.b. 2. Kinder) Wir vermieten auch noch ein Doppelzimmer, mit welchem Bad und Küche geteilt werden. Wir wohnen nicht in einer Partygegend. Es ist ruhig bei uns. Der Müggelsee ist nicht weit weg. In die City Ost braucht man mit der Bahn ca. 40 Minuten (Alexanderplatz). Die Unterkunft liegt im zweiten Obergeschoss. Es gibt keinen Aufzug (2 Treppen zu steigen). Köpenick ist der größte und grünste Stadtbezirk Berlins. Wir sagen: auch der schönste ;-) Für den Gästebereich (Einzelzimmer + separat vermietetes Doppelzimmer) gibt es sowohl einen eigenen Eingang als auch ein eigenes Badezimmer und eine Kochgelegenheit. Ich sehe meine Airbnb -Gäste zumeist beim Einzug und Auszug.  Dazwischen bin ich via Handy erreichbar.  Wir benutzen einen separaten Eingang zu unserer
properties.neighborhood_overview: Es handelt sich um eine ruhige Wohngegend. Wir haben eine Katze.  Diese darf in den Flur des Hauses jedoch nicht in Euer Gästeappartement.
properties.notes: Köpenick liegt im Süd-Osten der Stadt und ist eine eher ruhige Gegend mit einer hübschen Altstadt und viel Wasser.  Für Partypeople, die direkt aus der Disco oder Bar ins Bett fallen wollen sind wir nicht die richtige Location (sucht in Friedrichshain, Kreuzberg oder Neukölln). Gut zu erreichen sind z.B. die Kindl-Bühne Wuhlheide, der Innovationspark Wuhlheide oder das Fussballstadion alte Försterei (Eisern Union). Wer eine entspannte Unterkunft mit Privatsphäre sucht ist bei uns richtig!
properties.transit: S-Bahn-Station Berlin Köpenick. Die Straßenbahnhaltestellen Unter den Birken und Wongrowitzer Steig sind um die Ecke. Parkmöglichkeiten auf öffentlicher Straße vor dem Haus. Wir wohnen näher am Flughafen Berlin Schönefeld als an Tegel.  Bitte checkt eure Fortbewegungsmöglichkeiten mit den öffentlichen Verkehrsmitteln. Ich empfehle die Website (URL HIDDEN) Dort gibt es eine interaktive Fahrplanauskunft. Die S-Bahn-app bietet den gleichen Service und ist sehr gut.
properties.access: Für den Gästebereich (Einzelzimmer + separat vermietetes Doppelzimmer) gibt es sowohl einen eigenen Eingang als auch ein eigenes Badezimmer und eine Kochgelegenheit.
properties.interaction: Ich sehe meine Airbnb -Gäste zumeist beim Einzug und Auszug.  Dazwischen bin ich via Handy erreichbar.  Wir benutzen einen separaten Eingang zu unserer Wohnung. Wir vermieten nur,  wenn wir grundsätzlich auch anwesend sind.
properties.house_rules: Im Haus darf nicht geraucht werden.
properties.host_about:
Ich lebe mit meiner kleinen Familie in Köpenick. Wir renovieren Stück für Stück unser Haus und freuen uns über Gäste, die uns besuchen. Keine Angst, der Gästebereich ist schon fertig :-)

Ich mag nette Begegnungen und finde es schön, wenn sich Menschen bei mir wohlfühlen.

properties.name: Comfortable and well located Flat
properties.summary: Gute gelegene Wohnung (ideal für Pärchen) nahe dem Zentrum mit einem wunderschönen Blick über Berlin. Very well located Flat near the city center of Berlin with easy access to all the tourist spots and commerce. Perfect and clean view of Berlin.
properties.space: Das Zimmer befindet sich in meiner Wohnung (Wohnzimmer, Küche und Bad). Dieses vermiete ich NUR während meiner Abwesenheit. Ihr habt also eure Ruhe und seid allein und ungestört.  Die Wohnung verfügt über einen großen Balkon mit einem wunderschönen Blick über Berlin. The room, kitchen and bathroom are a part of my apartment. These I'll rent during my absence in Berlin, so you can have your privacy and rest. The apartment has a large balcony with a beautiful view of Berlin.

properties.access: WLAN vorhanden. The apartment has WiFi Connection.
properties.interaction: Ich bin jederzeit telefonisch erreichbar.  I can be reached in my phone anytime.
properties.house_rules: Ich erwarte Gäste, die mit meinen Möbeln und Gegenständen in der Wohnung umgehen, als wären es ihre Eigenen. Bitte keine Haustiere mitbringen. Keine Partys Nachtruhe von 22-7 Uhr  Rauchen ist NUR auf dem Balkon erlaubt. Das up- und downloaden sowie der Besuch illegaler Webseiten ist in und mit meinen W-Lan verboten. I'm expecting friendly guests, who are carefully with my furnitures and objects in the home, so the apartment stays organized and not damaged at the end of the stay. No Partys. No noise between 10pm and 6am. Pets are not allowed. Smoking is allowed ONLY at the balcony. Illegal Downloads and Uploads are completely forbidden in my WiFi Network or through any other internet connection in my House. Please be advised that illegal activity in Internet is prohibited and in case of it, the Fee will be redirected to you.

properties.name: Vermiete ein schönes Altbau-Zimmer

properties.neighborhood_overview: Vielfältige Einkaufsmöglichkeiten in unmittelbarer Nähe (Reichelt Einkaufsmarkt geöffnet Montag-Samstag 08.00-24.00 Uhr, Bäckereien, Konditorei, Aldi, diverse Spezialitätenläden). Sparkasse/Geldautomat  vor dem Haus.Jeden Sonntag Flohmarkt vor Reichelt  Einkaufsmarkt. Shoppingcenter in der Schloßstraße Steglitz in 15 Minuten mit dem Bus 186 erreichbar.  Many shopping possibilities very near. ATM, 5 minutes far. Busses 186 & 249
properties.notes: Das Gesetz über dem Bettensteuer betrifft leider auch meine private Wohnung. Zum Übernachtungspreis,müssen Sie 5% auf dem gesamten Nettobetrag zus. bezahlen. Am Einfachsten bar bei der Schlüsselübergabe.  Unfortunately I have to pay bed tax for my appartment! (5% Tax). You can pay cash when you get the keys.. Sorry for that.
properties.transit: Bus: Linie  249 Haltestelle direkt  vor dem Haus  täglich 05.00 Uhr bis 24.00 Uhr, Fahrzeit vom und zum  Bahnhof Zoo bzw. Kurfürstendamm 15 Minuten . S-Bahn: Ringbahn Bahnhof Heidelberger Platz und U-Bahn: Bahnhof Heidelberger Platz jeweils 10 Minuten Fußweg oder 3 Minuten mit Bus Linie 249  Stadtautobahn A100 Abfahrt Detmolder Straße bzw. A100, Abzweig Steglitz Abfahrt Mecklenburgische Straße   in 3 Minuten Entfernung. Bus 249 takes you to Berlin Zoologischer Garten in 13 min.

properties.interaction: Sie haben die ganze Unterkunft für sich alleine. You will have the whole appartment.
properties.house_rules: Rauchverbot in der Wohnung, Haustiere nicht erlaubt, Unbedingt Einhaltung der Ruhezeiten und Nachtruhe im Haus d.h. ab 22.00! Parken im Hof nicht erlaubt, im Straßenbereich gibt es genug freie Parkplätze!  In der Wohnung bitte achten, dass die Fenster nicht gleichzeitig in der Küche und Schlafzimmer offen bleiben (Windzug!)  Achtet auf die alten Dielen (Original 1904!) Keine schmale Absätze tragen.  Nach dem Duschen bitte Lüftung (Schalter an der Tür) einschalten. Und zumletzt, beide Fensterhebel (oben) in der Küche mit Vorsicht betätigen, sind nicht sehr stabil.
properties.host_about: Mein Name ist Rose Marie Rodriguez, ich bin Schweizerin und wohne seit 1986 in Berlin. Habe an der FU Berlin Betriebswirtschaftslehre studiert. Bin in der Mode Branche tätig und mag die schönen Dinge im Leben.

properties.name: Beautiful room in a stylish flat
properties.summary: This beautiful, sunny room in our lovely 105m2 apartment is exactly a place where you want to spend your short visit of Berlin!  Great location (there is plenty of bars/restos nearby, tram/U6/U9 are few minutes walk from the apartment) in a relatively quiet neighbourhood.

Kitchen with all supplies Bathroom (tube & toilet) Washing machine U6/U9 are 6-7 min walk away from our flat 25min by public transport from Tegel and about 45 minutes from Schönefeld Easy to get to any part of the city in under 30 minutes

properties.house_rules: Me and my flatmate are both working professionals and when we get home, we like to chill and relax. If you are a party animal or you like to come home in the middle of the night and make a lot of noise, then we are not the best match:-)

properties.name: elegant and exclusive apartment in lively Neukölln
properties.summary: This apartment is very special due to its layout and interior. It is not only tastefully furnished, but offers design and art - making the place very unique and harmonic. The apartment provides a lot of space, is comfortable and well organised.  A double bed, a long leather sofa, two comfy armchairs and a working place, (a foldout card table). Storage spaces, kitchen equipment and all the necessities is provided for.
properties.space: It is newly renovated, very clean and smart. And has yet a very friendly atmosphere - indoor plants and a green balcony facing the back yard.
properties.description: This apartment is very special due to its layout and interior. It is not only tastefully furnished, but offers design and art - making the place very unique and harmonic. The apartment provides a lot of space, is comfortable and well organised.  A double bed, a long leather sofa, two comfy armchairs and a working place, (a foldout card table). Storage spaces, kitchen equipment and all the necessities is provided for. It is newly renovated, very clean and smart. And has yet a very friendly atmosphere - indoor plants and a green balcony facing the back yard. For questions, recommendations and tips you can always reach me on my cell or via mail. The Neukölln district is rich in culture, adventure and convenient for living. It offers various possibilities for grocery shopping (farmers markets, organic shops etc.), numerous places for delicious and good value food, alternative bars and cafés (Weserstr, Hobrechtstr. ..), galleries, vintage stores - everything that represents the Berlin lifes
properties.neighborhood_overview: The Neukölln district is rich in culture, adventure and convenient for living. It offers various possibilities for grocery shopping (farmers markets, organic shops etc.), numerous places for delicious and good value food, alternative bars and cafés (Weserstr, Hobrechtstr. ..), galleries, vintage stores - everything that represents the Berlin lifestyle and all in closest reach! The place is nonetheless very quiet and private, the balcony is facing the back yard.
properties.transit: This area has great public transport connections - only 2 minutes walk to the next station (U7 Rathaus Neukölln), close to the circle line (Ringbahn S41/S42) and several busses M(PHONE NUMBER HIDDEN).. making it easy to go to Kreuzberg, Schöneberg,Friedrichshain, Mitte, Prenzlauer Berg..
properties.interaction: For questions, recommendations and tips you can always reach me on my cell or via mail.

properties.name: stylish comfortable studio in Neukölln
properties.summary: You will find here everything you need for a pleasent stay in the heart of the most hip and developing area in Berlin! --> One bright, stylish room with a very cosy bed, a well stuffed kitchen and a designer bathroom awaits you. Recently renovated, but the authentic old building charme has been maintained. --> 250m away from city train station S-Hermannstraße  --> the former Airport Tempelhof, now a beautiful park and outdoor activity area is in reach within 10 min walk
properties.space: Die Wohnung bietet Platz für 2 bis 4 Personen. allerdings ist es für 4 personen mit etwas weniger komfort zu rechnen.

properties.name: 4 small walls in the heart of Friedrichshain!
properties.summary: Located in the most lively and central part of Friedrichshain! The appartment is located in the back of the house so you will have a quiet sleep. The famous Simon-Dach-Straße is just 10 min. away.
properties.space: Ab sofort haben wir 4 kleine Wände & somit ein schnuckliges Gästezimmer im Herzen Friedrichshains für euch. Wir vermieten das Gästezimmer mit Doppelbett für 1-2 Personen. Die Wohnung besteht aus 3 großen Zimmern, einer gemütlichen Küche und einem tollen Badezimmer. Wir wohnen zu Zweit & freuen uns sehr über frischen Wind den Gäste mitbringen. Jedoch ist die Wohnung groß genug, damit jeder seine komplette Privatsphäre genießen kann. Vor der Tür sind unzählige Restaurants, Bars, Boutiquen und einer der schönsten Flohmärkte Berlins. In unmittelbarer Nähe befindet sich das RAW Gelände und zahllose Clubs.

properties.name: Cosy & central flat in Berlin Mitte
properties.summary: I'm offering my beautiful flat which is located right in the heart of Berlin Mitte. It's the perfect shelter to return to relax on the balcony after a long day of exploring.
properties.space: My flat consists of two rooms, a separate kitchen and a bathroom with a bathtub. The bathtub has no curtain as I prefer to take a bath mostly, so remember this when showering. The living room with the balcony is facing west to a big courtyard with lots of trees, so you have direct sunlight in the evening. The bedroom is spacy and quite minimal, it has a bed for two and I guarantee you a good sleep because of the quiet neighborhood.
properties.description: I'm offering my beautiful flat which is located right in the heart of Berlin Mitte. It's the perfect shelter to return to relax on the balcony after a long day of exploring. I won't take my personal belongings away, so I'm trusting in you to make use of it with the necessary respect, as if it was your own place. Personally I much prefer visiting and sharing "real" airbnbs with real people! The direct neighborhood is perfectly safe, quiet and relaxed. It's in a small side street and you can reach some cruci
properties.neighborhood_overview: The direct neighborhood is perfectly safe, quiet and relaxed. It's in a small side street and you can reach some crucial places within minutes. Rosenthaler Platz and Torstrasse are just a 10 minutes walk away, to Mauerpark it only takes 5 minutes, the wall museum is very close as well.
properties.transit: A stop of the U8 which directly leads to Alexanderplatz, Kreuzberg and Neukölln is just a 3 minute walk away, the M10 tram to reach Prenzlauer Berg, Friedrichshain and the main station is also very close.
properties.access: You can access and use my whole flat with all items. I won't take my personal belongings away, so I'm trusting in you to make use of it with the necessary respect, as if it was your own place. Personally I much prefer visiting and sharing "real" airbnbs with real people!
properties.house_rules: Partying is strictly forbidden. Smoking is only allowed on the balcony. No pets please!
properties.host_about:
Hello!
I'm an open minded designer for furniture, lighting and other things and I love to travel, meet people and see new places and cities.
Looking forward to stay with you, whoever you may be :-)

Daniel

properties.name: Ruhig u. mittendrin Pankow / P Berg
properties.summary: Ein großes Zimmer in toller Lage in Pankow / Prenzlauer Berg. ruhig gelegen aber nicht weit vom Zentrum. Supermärkte, SBahn, Parks alles in unmittelbarer Nähe. Zimmer ist ca 25m². Handtücher, Föhn, voll ausgestattete Küche, Bettwäsche... ist alles vorhanden
properties.space: Das Zimmer ist sehr groß (25m²)  Die Wohnung liegt sehr ruhig in Pankow / Prenzlauer Berg, ist aber auch nicht weit weg vom Zentrum. Tv ist im Zimmer vorhanden und der Spint kann als Kleiderschrank genutzt werden. S Bahn Wollankstraße ist ein paar Gehminuten entfernt und bietet eine super Anbindung. 15 min bis zum Alexanderplatz. Ich bin selber beruflich oft weg, also kann auch der Rest der Wohnung meist genutzt werden.

S1 und S25 sind eine sehr gute Anbindung zu den Zentren von Berlin. 15 min. zu Fuß gibt es auch die U2, die direkt zum Potsdamer Platz fährt. Taxi Nummer gebe ich Euch gerne. Ich bin ein unkomplizierter, ordentlicher und vor allem ruhiger Gast.
Ich biete selbst ein Zimmer in Berlin an und weiß deswegen auch, wie wichtig es ist, sich angemessen als Gast zu benehmen.

properties.name: Cosy room in newly renovated Kreuzberg flat
properties.summary: Light and peaceful room with a very comfortable sofa-bed. The flat is brand new and it's located in the hip Kreuzberg area with plenty of bars close by and a superb connection to all major points of interest.
properties.space: The room is very comfortable. The flat has two more bedrooms (us + 1 flatmate), a bright daylight bathroom and a well-equipped big kitchen. The flat has wooden floors and has been renovated recently. All rooms are very bright with natural daylight. The flat is in a house with several other flats and a nice mixture of neighbours. We are located on the second floor and there is no lift.
properties.description: Light and peaceful room with a very comfortable sofa-bed. The flat is brand new and it's located in the hip Kreuzberg area with plenty of bars close by and a superb connection to all major points of interest. The room is very comfortable. The flat has two more bedrooms (us + 1 flatmate), a bright daylight bathroom and a well-equipped big kitchen. The flat has wooden floors and has been renovated recently. All rooms are very bright with natural daylight. The flat is in a house with several other flats and a nice mixture of neighbours. We are located on the second floor and there is no lift. Guests have access to the bathroom, the balcony and the well-equipped kitchen with all common amenities, including a stove, fridge, freezer, dishwasher, etc. We work full-time during regular office hours but are available via phone or email at all times. We are more than happy to help where we can and provide guests with information on transport, maps and our very own recommendations for all purposes
properties.neighborhood_overview: The Kreuzberg area is very up and coming with very many cool and trendy bars in walking distance. It is known for its multi-cultural and liberal vibe. Also the city centre (Mitte) with all the main touristic attractions is quite close and can be easily reached by public transport or a longer walk. There is a supermarket just around the corner. Our street is mainly a residential area, but it's walking distance to some tourist attractions (such as Checkpoint Charlie) and to lively areas such as Oranienstr. and Kottbusser Tor. You can also find many delicious brunch spots around! :)
properties.notes: As we work during the week, if you plan to arrive during the day, we might need to arrange for a key pick up. This can be either close to our work or at a café nearby depending on which one is handier on your journey to the flat. Details can be discussed if needed.
properties.transit: We are very close to Prinzenstrasse (U1) and both Moritzplatz (U8) and Hallesches Tor (U6) are approximately ten minutes away. As Berlin is quite a wide-spread city and attractions are both in the former East and West, getting around by public transport is nearly essential if you want to see most things.
properties.access: Guests have access to the bathroom, the balcony and the well-equipped kitchen with all common amenities, including a stove, fridge, freezer, dishwasher, etc.
properties.interaction: We work full-time during regular office hours but are available via phone or email at all times. We are more than happy to help where we can and provide guests with information on transport, maps and our very own recommendations for all purposes.
properties.house_rules: We only have a few rules, as such. We expect from our guests the same kind of behaviour they could expect from us: if you use something, please make sure it is in the state it was before after you used it, no parties during the week, smoking is not permitted in the house (only in the balcony). We do advise of the German downloading regulations and illegal use of the internet is not permitted and guests will be liable of any charges occurring due to inappropriate file sharing.
properties.host_about:
Hello, we are David and Patrick :)
We have been living in Berlin for a while and we are looking forward to welcome you to this amazing place.
We are very easy-going and enjoy sharing experiences with fellow travelers.

properties.name: Beautiful room, huge flat, top location (P-Berg)
properties.summary: Beautiful room (22sqm) on first floor (Beletage) in a famous Berlin 'Altbau' (end of 19th century). Heritage building and apartment (180sqm) with high ceilings and elegant elements. Phenomenal location in the heart of Prenzlauer Berg on Kastanienallee. Close to Prater Garten, Kulturbrauerei, Mauerpark, Schönhauser Allee, Prenzlauer Allee, many restaurants, bars, clubs. Ideal public transportation directly in front of the house: Eberswalder Straße - Tram (M10, M1, 12) and metro (U2).
properties.space: I am excited to rent our room to you and am sure everything is prepared very nicely so you will enjoy your stay :-) You’ll love our flat because of the neighborhood, the outdoors space, and the light. Our place is good for couples, solo adventurers, and business travelers. It's a very cozy, bright, sunny, warm, comfortable place.

properties.neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is very safe day and night, quiet and green but at the same time plenty of things to do. A lot of shops, supermarkets, Bio shops, art galleries, bars, cafes, restaurants, flea markets, parks are in the area.
properties.transit: Free parking space is available just inside the yard. I will gladly answer all your questions around sightseeing, culture and give you tips for restaurants, cafes, bars, clubs. PS: Wir sprechen natürlich auch Deutsch ;-)
properties.access: Feel free to use kitchen, living room, bathrooms and all amenities inside (kitchen appliances, TV, Playstation, sound system, dishwasher, washing machine etc. + tea & coffee or a beer). Fresh sheets, towels and shampoo are of course ready for you.

properties.name: Lux Berlin 2: luxury & design
properties.summary: "Lux Berlin 2" is an elegant boutique apartment on the ever-popular Oderberger Strasse in the trendy district of Prenzlauer Berg, bordering on Mitte. The apartment is fully equipped for long stays; please contact me for special monthly rates.
properties.space: LUX BERLIN 2 is on the 4th floor of a beautifully restored art-nouveau building (with elevator access). Its impressive 2-metre high windows make it exceptionally bright and offer superb views of the surrounding area from all rooms. The apartment has been completely remodelled and renovated. Original features include high ceilings, double windows and hardwood floors; new additions include exposed brick walls, a modern bathroom with walk-in shower and rain shower and a stainless steel fitted kitchen with electrical appliances from Italian design brand SMEG. The interiors feature an eclectic mix of contemporary furniture in retro style and vintage pieces.  "Lux Berlin 2" combines old-Berlin charm with modern-day comfort and offers an exclusive living environment in one of the prettiest, most vibrant neighbourhoods of Berlin.  LUX BERLIN 2 AMENITIES:  -32" flat screen TV, DVD/CD player, smartphone/laptop connection cable, free WiFi. -Bedroom with king size bed, quality mattress, black-out
properties.description: "Lux Berlin 2" is an elegant boutique apartment on the ever-popular Oderberger Strasse in the trendy district of Prenzlauer Berg, bordering on Mitte. The apartment is fully equipped for long stays; please contact me for special monthly rates. LUX BERLIN 2 is on the 4th floor of a beautifully restored art-nouveau building (with elevator access). Its impressive 2-metre high windows make it exceptionally bright and offer superb views of the surrounding area from all rooms. The apartment has been completely remodelled and renovated. Original features include high ceilings, double windows and hardwood floors; new additions include exposed brick walls, a modern bathroom with walk-in shower and rain shower and a stainless steel fitted kitchen with electrical appliances from Italian design brand SMEG. The interiors feature an eclectic mix of contemporary furniture in retro style and vintage pieces.  "Lux Berlin 2" combines old-Berlin charm with modern-day comfort and offers an exclusive living
properties.neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in the trendy, vibrant district of Prenzlauer Berg, bordering on artistic, cosmopolitan Mitte. The Oderberger Strasse is a very lively yet very relaxed street that offers the distinctively bohemian vibe Prenzlauer Berg has been made famous for. Artsy cafés, quaint boutiques and laid back restaurants make it a favourite destination of locals and visitors alike.  Neighbourhood highlights include the Kastanienallee with its dozens of bars, restaurants and coffee shops -among which the renowned Prater, Berlin’s oldest beer garden- and the Mauerpark with its very popular Sunday flea market. The entertainment complex of the Kulturbrauerei is just around the corner, as well as the Kollwitzplatz with its fine wining and dining (and, of course, shopping). The not-to-be-missed Berlin Wall Memorial is in the vicinity of the apartments whereas Berlin landmarks such as the TV Tower or the Museum Island are a leisurely stroll.  This is an ideal base for exploring Berlin: rig
properties.transit: Underground: U2 Eberswalder Str.  Tram: M1, M12 EberswalderStr., M10 Jahn-Ludwig-Sportpark  (all 2-5 min. on foot from the apartment) Sample distances: -Alexanderplatz: subway 5 min. / on foot 20 min. -Hackescher Markt: tram  5 min / on foot 15 min. -Museum Island: tram 7 min. / on foot 20 min.  -Friedrichstrasse: tram 15 min. -Potsdamerplatz / Brandenburger Tor: subway 15 min.

properties.name: Modern Penthouse Studio, cosy quiet and bright
properties.summary: Modern and quiet penthouse studio located in the cultural heart of Berlin-Neukölln, a colorfull lively multi ethnic neighborhood with many different nationalities and cultural backgrounds. Galleries, Cafés, Bars, Parks and Groceries Stores are within walking distance or just nearby. Excellent public transport access only 4 blocks away. Tempelhof Airfield (former City Airport now open to the public) is reachable in just a few minutes walking.
properties.space: Great cosy Penthouse Studio with an open kitchen, private bathroom and quiet nights. The appartement has a double size bed (140x200cm) suitable for 2 persons, an extra single size matress for a 3rd guest is available. We have different types of pillows for all preferences. The modern kitchen is fully equipped for cooking or breakfast. The bathroom has a modern cabin shower. A table with 4 chairs, a desk and a large kitchen counter gives you all the space you need for working, cooking and eating. Cable TV via 32' flat screen and 4 big windows witch make this flat very bright.

properties.neighborhood_overview: The area is full of students, artists and people from all sorts of cultural backgrounds and nationalities. It is becoming a vivid neighborhood full of bars, cafés and art galleries but still not so hipsterish like i.e. Prenzlberg. Here is Berlin like it always was, a colorfull mix of all kinds of inhabitants. In walking distance you will find the Tempelhofer Feld, Berlin´s former airport build by the nazis and now Berlin´s biggest public park. Sporty people use the landing lanes for kite-boarding, skating and bike-riding. An urban gardening community turned part of the airport into a unique blossoming garden.  Two busy streets form the backbone of Neukölln, Karl-Marx-Str. and Hermannstr., both full of bustling cheap shops and eateries. The more cooler sites lay in the backstreets like Weserstr., Herrfurthplatz in the Shillerkietz, nearby Emser Str. or little father Kreuzberg and the so called Kreuzkölln, along many others.
properties.notes: The Studio is located in the 5th floor. Guests with walking disabilities may encounter some (URL HIDDEN) lift available :-/ There's a communicating door to the main apartement where i live. Don't worry about privacy, it's kept locked at all times and it's only for emergency use. I use an other entrance.
properties.transit: Close to the apartment (350m) you will find the subway station Hermannstr. which is well connected to the City and to the Airport. The Airport Schönefeld is 30 min and the City Center 15 min away. Kreuzberg is a bike ride away where you can find more bars, cafés and museums.
properties.access: The Studio appartement has an independent access and is for the exclusive use of the guests. You will receive a set of keys and a second set is available if needed.  Be aware that the flat is at the 5th floor and there is no lift.
properties.interaction: I am happy to show you the apartment and to give you all information you need to have a great time in Berlin. If you want to know more about me and my city I am happy to have a chat or dinner together. If you want to enjoy some private time I totally understand. If you have any questions during your stay you can contact me anytime, i live right next door.
properties.house_rules: Please treat my apartment as if it were yours. Feel at home, but use everything with care and respect. Internet Disclaimer: downloading of torrents or similar shared files is not allowed. Guests are 100% liable for illegal internet activities.
properties.host_about:
I lived in many places around the world to finally find my little paradise in Berlin - the green city that never sleeps and changes every day!
During my journeys to all continents I received a lot of support from many hosts and from my personal experiences as a professional traveller (i'm a Flight Attendant since 27 years) I've learned what is most important to feel welcome and at home in an unknown destination. I will do my best to make sure you will have a wonderfull time! I speak 5 Languages and know the customs and needs of different cultures.

properties.name: Waterfront loft-style apartment in Kreuzberg
properties.summary: The apartment is located on the Kreuzberg side of Oberbaumbrücke with a direct view of the Spree river. Whilst in the middle of social and cultural happenings, the apartment is quiet with the bedroom and the connecting balcony giving view to a green interior court.  The apartment is ideally suited for one or two people with the kingsize bed but can comfortably sleep up to four people with an extra mattress and a large sleep sofa available.
properties.space: The apartment is equipped with home cinema and surround sound setup including Netflix, wireless HDMI computer to TV connection, NBA league pass. The kitchen was individually designed by friends and myself and it offers everything you might need for home-cooked meals.

properties.neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located right on the border where the old East and West used to be seperated. One walk over the bridge gets you from Kreuzberg (west) into Friedrichshain (east). The tiny tree-laced street where the apartment is located is one of Berlins most beautiful as it offers riverside walks opposite to East Side Galery. You will find a wide variety of cafés, bars, and restaurants along with galleries, boutiques and concert venues all within walking distance.

properties.space: This beautiful apartment is on the second floor for Americans or first floor if you are European / British. It is absolutely quiet and tucked in between two inner courtyards yet still light and sunny. It consists of two rooms plus a bathroom with a showed / tub. properties.neighborhood_overview: Prenzlauer Berg is a great hip Berlin neighborhood. Just outside the apartment is an array of good restaurants for all budgets, lots of cafés, and nice stores. Lychener Straße is host to some of my favorite bars but once you enter the house, you will find it is very quiet and has a relaxing atmosphere.  Kulturbrauerei, Mauerpark, and Helmholtzplatz are all just a stone's throw away.
properties.transit: The intersection of Eberswalder Strasse and Schönhauser Allee is a 4min walk. From there, you can take the M10 line to Friedrichshain or the train station (about 15min) or the U2 to take you to Alexanderplatz (3 stops) / Mitte to access all the rest of Berlin.

properties.house_rules: As this is my own place and I live here all year long, I would simply like to ask you to treat my space and my neighbors with the same respect you would expect. :-) Please do not smoke inside the apartment but you are welcome to smoke on the balcony.
properties.host_about:
I travel the world for my job and sometimes use Airbnb. I love my apartment and my neighborhood and am glad to share advice for any of my guests.

Avid lover of good food and I can tell a personal story or two about life in East Germany or German history.

properties.name: The Heart of Berlin - Sweet Mitte!
properties.summary: Right in the center of it all - a lively, safe, clean area on a historical sweet street! Restaurants galore, unique boutiques, upscale designers, weekend farmers market, banks & markets nearby with very easy access to main metro, trains, bus, taxis. Berlin has a bit of everything - you'll love discovering new places, people, and international culture :)
properties.space: Located within the Hackescher Höhe and on a sweet street in Berlin Mitte.  The area is lively at all hours, but still feels chill, cosy, and is a very safe area. Several parks nearby and beautiful lakes are a 45min day trip from the city.

It is very central, super easy to walk to popular areas like Museum Island, Monbijou Park bowling lanes, shopping, hair & nail salons, weekend farmers market, EDEKA (grocery store) just steps away - (really nice fr
properties.neighborhood_overview: It is very central, super easy to walk to popular areas like Museum Island, Monbijou Park bowling lanes, shopping, hair & nail salons, weekend farmers market, EDEKA (grocery store) just steps away - (really nice fruits and fresh pastas!), a couple movie theatres 5min around the corner, close to S-train (to main station) and U6 which takes you to Kreuzberg for clubbing, M1 takes you to Torstrasse, M2 near Alexanderplatz (15min walk) takes you to Prenzlauerberg.  Also the S-train at Hackescher takes you to Zoo/Tiergarten to see the West side of Berlin or one stop away to Friedrichstrasse "Upper East Side of  Berlin".  There is a park nearby where you can enjoy the river and a beer at the StrandBar.  Being so well located, you save money not having to take taxis, but when you do need one, there is a taxi stand around the corner (comes in handy for early morning flights!).
properties.notes: If questions about Berlin, startup & tech scene or however else I can advise - feel free to ask me. Hamburg, a great city ( I lived there for 5 years attending law school), is less than 2hrs by ICE train from Berlin.
properties.transit: Most people find the trains, buses and subways perfect, easy, inexpensive, and reliable. Otherwise you can rent bikes all around the city. Walking is also wonderful when the sunshine is out, Berlin is amazing to explore by foot - absorb all that art & history! If you have a car, parking on our street is free, you just have to find a spot. If you have Car2Go or DriveNow memberships, the cars are often available in this area.
properties.access: Kitchen, bathroom, restaurant below the apartment has a courtyard in the back.  The room is private.
properties.interaction: I work a lot from home but also have an office so you see me everyday but hours can vary.
properties.house_rules: Please no smoking, wearing shoes (take them off at the door), or pets in the house.  The flat is very private so it is intended only for the guest that has booked the stay (no additional house guests please - the building is exceptionally private). My neighbors are friendly lawyers and there is a quiet family below my flat, so a very calm and safe building to feel comfortable navigating the city from.   I am sharing the flat with you and work a lot, however when I have down time, I do love meeting other entrepreneurial, tech, or media personalities. Welcome to Berlin!!!
properties.host_about:
PR,  growth marketing, brand development and social media for startups.  I consult a Venture Capital firm, as a business analyst for AI, IoT, hardware, and drone companies. 

LOVES:  vegan/raw foods, travel, oceanside views, warm sunsets, islands in the sun, yachting, a former board-sports girl most of my life (learned to kite board in beautiful South Africa) and filming with GoPro.  

Berlin has become a metropolitan tech mecca, rich with culture and attracts many international personalities, so I'm lucky to be surrounded by talented, innovative people.  Always excited to  meet likeminded entrepreneurs, artists/creatives, developers, mathematicians, investors, especially areas of focus like: machine learning, AI, cryptology,  blockchain.  I live a balanced, wellness lifestyle, so I cook mainly fresh, organic, plant based foods.

I'm easily reachable and am in regular contact with my guests - we will share the flat.  I invest into experiences more than material things so my flat reflects this minimalistic mindset, but it's very clean, really cosy and "incredibly central!" I provide a light breakfast "on request" for my guest, during their stay :)

If you are a first time user of Airbnb or do not have references, please tell me a bit about yourself and your reason for visiting Berlin, so that I can ensure you have the most positive experience as a guest in our city and my home. Welcome to our city!

properties.neighborhood_overview: The apartment borders the hip Prenzlauer Berg area but with extremely close proximity to the centre of the city.  With plenty of green spaces, cafe's and restaurants in the local surroundings, the convenient subway Ubahn at the building entrance provides an excellent transport link for exploring the whole city.  Because your stay is extremely central, being part of this experience means there will always be some ambient city noise when doors/windows are open. Mitte’s hotspots for culture and nightlife, Berlin's gallery area, such as hip Hackescher Markt and Oranienburger Straße, Museum Island and the state Opera are only a short distance away.  You won't find a more central, luxury and convenient location to enjoy your stay in Berlin with two convenient supermarkets within 400 metres of the apartment.

properties.access: The apartment includes free wifi access with dedicated modem, bedding and towels, a hair dryer, shower gel, dishwashing tabs and washing up liquid. The apartment has a convenient washing machine and dryer plus a separate drying stand particularly suited for longer staying guests.  If you require a baby bed please contact us prior to confirm.
properties.interaction: We meet all our guests at the apartment address.  It´s important that you contact us prior to arrival to ensure a smooth check-in as we do not live at the property. Please note any check-in´s between 9.30pm and Midnight attract a 20 euro surcharge payable in cash on check-in.  Check-ins after midnight are not possible.
properties.house_rules: Check-ins after midnight are not possible. Check-in´s between 9.30pm and Midnight attract a 20 euro surcharge payable in cash on check-in.   No smoking inside the apartment. Quiet from 10pm each night. Please send us your arrival details (by air, car or train) as soon as you have them in order to ensure a smooth check-in. Once you arrive in Berlin please contact us to re-confirm a meeting time at the apartment 60 minutes prior to arrival. Absolutely no more guests permitted to stay than what have been booked for. Early check-ins possible before 3pm but please contact us first. Late check-outs after 10am may be possible but please contact us first.
properties.host_about:
English/Deutsch/Francais

Hi, we are a family operated apartment management business located in the Berlin suburb of Prenzlauer Berg.  We manage apartments on behalf of owners when they are not in town.  All of our apartments are located in central Berlin with easy access to public transport, supermarkets and local eateries.  We are always at close hand if you have any issues.  Our apartments are well maintained, secure, kept in clean order and we include all bedding, towels, shower soap and importantly hair dryers!  Free Wifi and a washing machine are standard in every apartment for your convenience.  Please feel free to check-out our past guest reviews, we endeavour to make your stay as comfortable as possible. If you have any questions at all please do not hesitate to contact us.  We look forward to your visit!
_______________________________________________________________
Hallo, wir sind ein Familienunternehmen mit Sitz im Prenzlauer Berg und spezialisieren uns auf die Betreuung von Wohnungen. Alle unsere Wohnungen befinden sich im Zentrum von Berlin mit guter Anbindung an den öffentlichen Verkehr, Supermärkte und Restaurants. Sollte es Probleme geben, sind wir immer in der Nähe. Alle Wohnungen sind gut instandgehalten und legen großen Wert auf Sauberkeit. Bettwäsche, Handtücher, Duschgel und ein Fön sind in jeder einzelnen Wohnung standardmäßig enthalten. Zudem stehen auch in jeder Wohnung kostenloses WLAN und eine eigene Waschmaschine zur Verfügung. In unseren Gästebewertungen könnt Ihr sehen, dass wir Euren Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich machen wollen. Bei Fragen könnt Ihr uns jederzeit kontaktieren. Wir freuen uns auf Euren Besuch!
_______________________________________________________________
Salut! Nous sommes une entreprise familiale, spécialisée en louer des appartements de vacances dans le centre de Berlin. Tous nos appartements se trouvent dans le centre ville à proximité des transports en commun, des supermarchés et des restaurants. S`il y a des problèmes, nous sommes tout près. Nous entretenons tous les appartements et nous faisons attention, qu`ils sont bien nettoyés. Des housses, des serviettes, du gel douche et bien sur un sèche-cheveux sont inclus dans chaque appartement. En plus, il y a un accès à internet gratuit et une lave-linge. Veuillez vous référer à nos excellents commentaires clients, car nous essayons de faire votre séjour le plus confortable. Si vous avez des questions, vous pouvez nous bien contacter. Nous nous réjouissions à votre séjour dans un de nos appartements!

properties.neighborhood_overview: The neighborhood is quite nice and the districts Berlin Mitte and Wedding are in walking distance, because as the first house in Moabit we are right at the border. There are many cafes, shops and supermarkets nearby. Also, Moabit/Wedding is surrounded by the canal and the Spree and we have many touristic spots nearby, even in walking distance, such as the main station, German Parliament or the Brandeburger Gate. A nice club is also 2 km away (Heideglühen) -a more or less secret club with electronic music and an outdoor area....
properties.notes: Dear guest, to get the best possible experience for all of us during you stay at my lovely place, it's important to read the description of my flat carefully. My two cats are curious little creatures who will attempt to cuddle you if you like that. It is also important that you close the windows before you go out of your new home, in order to keep the cats inside the flat. They are not supposed to go out of the house! Also i would like to encourage you to keep the kitchen and the bathroom clean and tidy. In order to maintain this and with respect to all ladies and my cultural background, I friendly ask all gentleman to sit down on the toilet. Also, please use the toilet brush when needed. A Squeegee is in the shower. All the best and looking forward to meeting you :)
properties.transit: Within walking distance is the underground U7, U6 and U8 next to the railway stations S41/42/5/7 and others as we are within walking distance to the main station (15-20 minutes). In front of my place is the bus stop where you can take the busses M27 or 123. The main station is also within walking distance (15-20 min), which gives access to a variety of underground, railway station and regional trains as well as many buses which you can use. When you don't like to use my racing bike, there are many rental places for bikes, too.
properties.access: We share the kitchen and the bathroom. You can also use the devices in the kitchen. I also have a washing machine which you can use. Towels and sheets are included as well. properties.house_rules: Treat others as you would like to be treated. :)))

Hi.

properties.name: 40,5m² Apartment close by Richard Sqare Neukölln
properties.summary: Berlin Neukölln is colorful. The Richard district itself is part of Rixdorf a former small village , which was gradually absorbed by the growing city of Berlin. The tiny lovely spot called Rixdorf is now trapped between Sonnenallee and Karl Marx Str.  Everything here is within walking distance. Whether you feel like listening to an opera , swimming or going on the roof-top of the Klunkerkranich. Bars invite you to linger. There are plenty of culinary delights and lot's of green.
properties.space: Die Wohnung ist im Herzen von Neukölln und ideal für 2 Personen. Auf 40,5m² habe ich mich im Design ausgetobt. Fast alle Zimmer sind harmonisch indirekt beleuchtet. Alle Räume sind mit Stuck versehen. Nachts leuchten auch die Fliesen in der Küche. So dass ihr leicht den Weg ins Bad findet. Es gibt eine kleine Schlafkammer mit einem 1,60m Doppelbett die kuschelig von einer Kaffeetasse beleuchtet wird.  Die Wohnung ist modern eingerichtet. Im Wohnzimmer befindet sich eine ausziehbare Couch(falls auch mal 4Personen übernachten wollen) ein großer Kleiderschrank sowie eine Kommode mit Handtüchern, Bettzeug etc.  Ihr habt eine voll ausgestattete Küche  mit Geschirrspüler, Wasserkocher, Mikrowelle, Backofen, Kaffeemaschine etc. Im Bad befindet sich neben einem großen Spiegel auch eine Waschmaschine falls ihr mal dringend etwas waschen müsst. Da unsere Liebe an der Gestaltung hängt, wollen wir keine Partypeople in der Wohnung.  Wir wollen Leute die Kultur schätzen und sich auch locker im Spann
properties.description: Berlin Neukölln is colorful. The Richard district itself is part of Rixdorf a former small village , which was gradually absorbed by the growing city of Berlin. The tiny lovely spot called Rixdorf is now trapped between Sonnenallee and Karl Marx Str.  Everything here is within walking distance. Whether you feel like listening to an opera , swimming or going on the roof-top of the Klunkerkranich. Bars invite you to linger. There are plenty of culinary delights and lot's of green.
properties.neighborhood_overview: Der Stadteil Rixdorf ist eine Mischung aus einem Böhmischen Dorf und dem Berliner Multikulti. Es ist an manchen Ecken schroff und an manchen romantisch. Es ist leider nie besonders sauber. Aber vieleicht wird das auch einmal. ;-)
properties.notes: Derzeit ist eine Baustelle auf der Karl-Marx Str. dort wird die U-Bahn bis Ende 2017 saniert.
properties.transit: Die nächste U-Bahnstation ist die Karl-Marxstr. (U7). Parken kann man im gesamten Kiez kostenfrei.
properties.interaction: Ihr könnt mich bzw. meine Frau Anja immer anrufen, solltet Ihr Fragen haben. Wenn möglich komme ich auch gern vorbei. Wenn Ihr spezielle Wünsche habt, wie das Apartment vorbereitet sein soll (Blumen, Sekt etc.) dann sagt kurz Bescheid und wir kümmern uns.
properties.house_rules: - Please be honest with us. In case of damages please contact us or drop us a note. - In case you are running late with your arrival please contact us.  - The cleaning does not mean to leave the flat in a total mess. ;-) Please be so kind and try to make it also easy for us.  - If you have ideas how we can improve the hosting we are happy to listen to your thoughts.
properties.host_about: I was born in Cottbus, live now with my family 2 kids and my wife in Berlin. I work in the field of future studies and corporate foresight. I love procrastination it makes me really effective. In Germany I run the company called Schaltzeit.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Der Plänterwald und die Spree sind gegenüber, und es gibt einen schönen Fuss- und Radweg am Fluss entlang ins benachbarte Trendviertel Kreuzberg. Häuser aus der Zeit der Jahrhundertwende, viele Bäume, der Park und der Fluß machen das Wohngebiet besonders. Die Wege ins Stadtzentrum mit Bus und S-Bahn sind kurz und einfach.  An urban forest and the river Spree are across the road. There's a nice way along the river (for cycling or walking) to the trendy neighbourhood Kreuzberg. Houses from around 1900, the many trees, the big park and the river do make the area special. Ways into the city centre by train or bus are short and comfortable. We speak German , English , Russian, French and a little bit of Spanish and Arabic.
properties.notes: The city Berlin takes an extra fee of five percent of the total cost for the room as city tax, for our room that would be 1,50 EUR per night.

Durch eine separate Tür ist Privatsphäre garantiert. Doppelzimmer, Kleines Zimmer mit ausziehbarem Bett (für zwei Personen), kleine Küche und natürlich ein Bad (Dusche). Für Partypeople, die direkt aus der Disco oder Bar ins Bett fallen wollen sind wir nicht die richtige Location (sucht in Friedrichshain, Kreuzberg oder Neukölln). Gut zu erreichen sind z.B. die Kindl-Bühne Wuhlheide, der Innovationspark Wuhlheide oder das Fussballstadion alte Försterei (Eisern Union). Wer eine entspannte Unterkunft mit Privatsphäre sucht ist bei uns richtig!

properties.name: Lovely Room in Friedrichshain
properties.summary: Enjoy a comfy room in a great location! The room is part of a 4-room flat, located in a quiet part of the wonderful  Friedrichshain. There is also a lot to explore within walking distance: East Side Gallery, Treptower Park, cafés and famous clubs.
properties.description: Enjoy a comfy room in a great location! The room is part of a 4-room flat, located in a quiet part of the wonderful  Friedrichshain. There is also a lot to explore within walking distance: East Side Gallery, Treptower Park, cafés and famous clubs.
properties.house_rules: Everyone who books must have had previous experience with Airbnb. If you are new to the platform or simply you are not sure how things work DON'T ASSUME, PLEASE ASK. I prefer communication over misunderstanding. You also need to have a clear profile photo and some info that can help me understand who you are. ( A photo of you only, not additional 10 friends and some info about what do you do outside of traveling) If not please feel free to write that along with the request. Please read CAREFULLY the Cancellation Policy. If things go south, you are obligated to know this. Other than this I am pretty flexible.
properties.host_about:
Hallochen,

I'm Eliza, I'm a language and culture lover, film aficionada and traveller.
I work as an editor and also study my M.A.

Since I moved to Berlin there hasn't been one single boring moment so if you have some curiosities about the city, either for exploration purposes or just for a laid-back afternoon feel free to ask away. We are located in the indie area, baby! There's plenty to do here.

Bis Bald

properties.name: Cosy room for 2-4 persons at Checkpoint Charlie
properties.summary: Discover and enjoy Berlin from the very heart of the city, directly at Checkpoint Charlie! Our modern flat is situated between Potsdamer Platz and Alexander Platz. With U2/U6 (Station Stadtmitte) almost in front of the door, you can reach the most historical and cultural attractions in the center of Berlin within few minutes by foot. Our 25 m2 big room is fully equipped with two sofas, bed clothes,fully equiped kitchen,private bathroom with shower and hairdryer. Smoking is allowed on the balcony
properties.space: I   Top quality and privacy Although the flat is located very central, the room is quiet with a nice, clean bathroom adjacent only for guests. Your privacy is guaranteed. II   Top location!! Public transportation connections to the whole city, railway and bus stations and both airports (by tube and bus). Please be aware that the price is for 2 persons and for any additional person there is additional fee. For the third and fourth person the second sofa must also be opened and before opening must be pushed/pulled towards the corridor to the bathroom, in order to have enough place to open for both sofas (they will stay in the right angle position to each other). This is to be done by you. So, before booking, please think about this and if this is OK for you. We will provide you enough bed clothing, pillows, towels... etc. for four persons. Detailed explanation how to reach us will follow after your booking is confirmed.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Be our guests if you also like the same things that we like in our neighborhood: Most important culture and historical locations within walking distance. Being in the middle of the biggest German city and still be able to sleep calm at night near the open window. Restaurants and supermarkets in and around the building, opened even on Sundays. Perfect transport connections and "Hop in - Hop off" tourist bus right around the corner.
properties.notes: We are looking forward to hosting you and will gladly stay at your disposal for all information about Berlin and Germany. Smoking is not permitted inside the entire housing complex.  On the balcony it is allowed, there is an ashtray provided. We kindly ask you to keep noises at a reasonable level, especially after 10pm and on the balcony. No partys, alcohol or drugs consumption, please. No pets are allowed, sorry. Please do not use the Wi-Fi for downloading or streaming copyrighted content such as movies, software or data in general. Every violation will lead to an immediate report.  A fee of 150 € is to be paid for the loss of an entrance key.
properties.transit: Tube lines U6 & U2 Stadtmitte, bus M48, night bus, taxi service, car-sharing area, Bike-to-rent, Hop in - hop off bus. By foot: 2 minutes to Chechpoint Charlie 5 minutes to the biggest shopping mall "The Mall of Berlin" 10 minutes to Potsdamer Platz 10 minutes to the railway and underground station Friedrichstraße 15 minutes to the Brandenburger Gate/Unten den Linden 20 minutes to Alexander Platz By bus or tube: 5 minutes to railway and underground station Friedrichstraße 10 minutes to Potsdamer Platz 15 minutes to the Central Station (Hauptbahnhof) 15 minutes to Alexander Platz 20 minutes to Ku'damm/KDW/Gedächtniskirche 50 minutes to Tegel Airport 65 minutes to Schönefeld Airport
properties.access: Elevator Two sofas with bed clothes for max four persons Kitchen - fully equipped  Private bathroom with shower, towels and a hair dryer Balcony Working place Closet Internet (WiFi) Bicycles and motorcycles could be parked in the underground garage for free.
properties.interaction: We permanently live in the rest of the apartment so there's a high chance we'll come across each other. We can help you with whatever you need and we're handing you the keys to the apartment ourselves. In case that we are at work or on holiday, there's a 24/7 doorman-service provided for the entire housing area. We speak German, English and a little bit French. After booking the room, please send us as soon as you know your exact arrival and departure times, in order to coordinate cleaning of the room on time. Thank you!
properties.house_rules: Wir bitten euch keine Partys und kein Lärm nach 22 Uhr zu machen, die unsere Nachbarschaft stören könnten. Das gilt besonders für Balkon.
properties.host_about: We're couple with two children (23 and 21 years) from Berlin. Children are students, we are both economists. My husband works in automotive industry and I work for a digital marketing company. My personal favorites are yoga practice and gardening, we also ride bikes and do different sports, depending on the season. We read a loot and travel as often as we can.

properties.name: Too good to be true - in Friedrichshain Berlin
properties.summary: Make yourself comfortable in the apartment, cook something delicious or simply relax after your adventures in Friedrichshain around Boxhagener Platz or after a busy day/or night elsewhere.    Enjoy your pleasantly quiet apartment!
properties.space: - New furnished apartment in recently high standard renovated old building from 1905. - Theoretically you could arrive just with only your tooth brush. - The apartment is on the ground floor, situated to the green and quiet courtyard, where a cosy terrace with bench and table invites you to smoke a cigarette or simply enjoy the singing of the birds in the trees, you're looking at.. - It has a very high ceiling of 3,50m, a wooden floor in the main room and lovely green and white cement tiles in kitchen, shower and toilet. In the kitchen there is  - a cooking stove with oven, - a refrigerator, - a microwave,  - dish/tea towels, - a water boiler,  - espresso can, - toaster,  - a coffee machine for filter coffee,  -  different teas,  - filter coffee,  - oil, vinegar, salt and pepper,  - condensed milk, milk powder and sugar, - and plates, glasses, cooking pots, pans,  - knifes and forks and all the other cutlery, bottle opener, tin opener, etc.  -  and a washing machine and washing powder.

properties.neighborhood_overview: Friedrichshain is a very interesting neighborhood, where you find numerous bars and cafés, a food market on saturdays and the gorgeous flea market on sundays at the Boxhagener Platz! Right around the corner you will find the famous Frankfurter Allee - the former Stalinallee - a historic housing project of the GDR (former East Germany), now also a good place to see lovely sunsets.
properties.notes: Ja - der Bäcker ist nur 3 Häuser weiter in der Hausnummer 2 - in Haus gegenüber ist eine sehr gute Eisdiele - links an der Ecke und dann 8 Häuser weiter ist ein Supermarkt NETTO,   eine Straße weiter ist nicht ein BRUTTO, sondern ein BIO-ÖKO-SUPERMARKT.    Und jede Menge Späääääätkauf-Geschäft(URL HIDDEN) eine Spezialität von Friedrichshain - ausserdem können Sie überall süße oder pikante Häppchen kaufen.
properties.transit: Subway no. 5 brings you in 5 minutes from 'Samariter Str.' or 'Frankfurter Allee' to 'Alexanderplatz' or you take the tram to get to Kreuzberg or Prenzlauer Berg, which is both about 15 min. away from 'Frankfurter Allee'.
properties.access: The studio is a quiet place in the courtyard and is a privat apartment, where the guests can make themselves comfortable. There is no possibility for having parties, because the neighbours need rest too!
properties.interaction: - If it is needed, I will be there, if not, not. - But do not hesitate to ask for help or information!
properties.house_rules: please switch off the lights and turn down the heating to level 2 when you are leaving the house. please don't party too loud - my neighbors hear everything!  ...And sorry ... smoking is not allowed inside the apartment ...
properties.host_about: Hello, I'm Apostolos. I like to welcome you in my beautiful apartment in Berlin-Friedrichshain and I wish you a great stay. Yes, I know - you will like the place and the area.

properties.name: Room in Friedrichshain-Treptow
properties.summary: Hi there, The room is part of a retro apartment building with an industrial look. The best thing about the location is that the connections are fantastic, reaching everywhere in a blink of an eye. (Friedrichshain in Treptower, Kreuzberg)
properties.space: The room is vivid and colourful, while very warm and really comfortable in winter. The utilities are practical and minimalistic. There is a pull-out sofa-bed which can easily accommodate two people and a direct access to a big balcony for relaxation and hang-outs.

The best thing about the location is that the connections are fantastic, reaching everywhere in a blink of an eye. The bathroom is quite spacious, including washing machine, WC and bathtub / shower.Towels and bedsheets are provided if you wish. properties.neighborhood_overview: Friedrichshain is overflowing with creativity. Quirky cafes, cool galleries, museums and grass-roots hangouts abound in what is one of Berlin’s most artsy hubs. The urban space within its borders is used as a platform for expressing progressive thinking, to inspire and educate, while the social and cultural gatherings that occur on the streets make it one marvellous place to explore.
properties.notes: Places like living-room, kitchen and bathroom are shared during the stay either with the (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN).
properties.transit: From our house is S-Bahn station Ostkreuz about 5 min walking distance. Here you can take the Ring-Bahn and the S5 or S47 going over Hauptbahnhof, Alexanderplatz, Potsdamer Platz or Charlottenburg in 5 to 10 minutes. In front of the house, literally, there is the bus 347 that goes to Warschauerstr. in 5 min and 194 to Neukolln. If you use the bike, Treptower Park and the Spree is 7 minutes away.
properties.access: The kitchen is suitable for cooking coffee until souffle and everything in between. The bathroom is quite spacious, including washing machine, WC and bathtub / shower.Towels and bedsheets are provided if you wish.
properties.interaction: We love to help around, with a best-route itinerary, most thrilling museum or even the last week's mind-blowing party. We also like to maintain the meditative silence. So every interaction is upon request.
properties.house_rules: 1. No smoking in the house. 2. Smoking allowed on the balcony. 3. After usage of kitchen or bathroom, please make sure you leave everything clean are ready for re-use. 4. Turn off light and heating when you leave the house. ( Save some energy) 5. Please follow the recycling waste separation in the kitchen. 6. If you have some requirements, please don't hesitate to ask.
