properties.name: Cozy Apartment at Schönhauser Allee
properties.summary: My charming apartment, full furnished and lovely decorated is centrally located in Berlin. You have everything you need for near by. And for trips an easy access to major sublines. It really quiet and family friendly! But also for couples!
properties.space: I am subletting my beloved apartment in Schönhauser Allee. It is fully furnished and carefully decorated. Very nice appartment for a couple, or one adult more or a family with two kids.  The place is in the heart of lively Berlin Prenzlauer Berg on one of Berlin's famous family places. It is minutes away from some of the city's best clubs, restaurants and shopping areas. You will have shops like an normal supermarket and two organic - food shops in the same street. On sunday you can have fresh rolls at one of the organic -food shop. Both S-Bahn (all) and U-Bahn (U2) stations and the M1/M10 tram station are each a two minute walk from the front door, so if you're in Berlin for one week,  this is the perfect place to live and explore the city! The flat is in a pretty period building (18th century) in the side "wing" overlooking the courtyard, so it's very quiet. 1 bedroom are for children which makes the place very warm and special.  - Fully equipped kitchen: big fridge, oven, full set o

properties.name: Chillout-WG-2017 - Entspannungszimmer
properties.summary: Hey, wir sind zur Zeit eine Drei-Männer-WG, Dennis (31), Massimo (43) und ich (42).  Wenn ich nicht da bin, vermiete ich mein Musikzimmer. Sehr angenehme meditative Atmosphäre, wenn man das mag. we are three roommates (three men) and I rent my music practice room when I am travelling.  So if you're looking for a room with a meditative atmosphere, good connected to public transports you are welcome to contact us :-) Thomas, Dennis and Massimo
properties.space: Unsere Vier Zimmer Wohnung liegt im Erdgeschoß und hat eine kleine Terrasse zum Innenhof mit etwas Grünfläche. In der Mitte befindet sich eine geräumige Wohnküche mit einem zum Esstisch umfunktionierten Billardtisch. Dein Zimmer befindet sich zum Innenhof hin und hat einen Ausgang zur kleinen Terrasse. Das Zimmer geht ums Eck, was es recht gemütlich macht. Kommt auf den Fotos nicht so raus. Das Haus ist recht modern und gut gegen Lärm isoliert. Wir haben zwei Bäder, eines mit Dusche und das andere mit einer Badewanne. Beide stehen zur Nutzung zur Verfügung. Außerdem stehen eine Spül- und Waschmaschine sowie ein Wäschetrockner zur Verfügung. Bettlaken und Bettwäsche sind vorhanden. Handtücher können wir ebenfalls auf Wunsch zur Verfügung stellen.

properties.name: Luxury Mitte Penthouse 3Bed, 3Bath
properties.summary: Winner of the "Holiday Home Award 2015" in the category "Best Apartment in an European Capital". Newly built, centrally located apartment with plenty of space and 3 bathrooms!
properties.space: The penthouse offers a superb choice for guests seeking a central and spacious location.  The apartment offers great open plan living ideally suited for families, couples or business travelers wishing to have great social space. The kitchen is fully equipped for light or full dining having all the  amenities for a great stay including dishwasher, refrigerator, oven and cook top, ice maker and wine cooler.  3 large luxury bedrooms consisting of the master bedroom with queen size bed, LCD TV and a walk in en-suite with full bath tub and separate shower.  The second bedroom contains a double bed and en-suite with shower and the third bedroom contains a double bed with a separate bathroom that can also be used for other guests.. The leather lounge suites offer a great place to relax while enjoying the large screen TV or consider spending some time on the large balcony off the main living area.  A full laundry is offered with washer and clothes dryer, particularly suited for guests travelin
properties.description: Winner of the "Holiday Home Award 2015" in the category "Best Apartment in an European Capital". Newly built, centrally located apartment with plenty of space and 3 bathrooms! The apartment offers great open plan living ideally suited for families, couples or business travelers wishing to have great social space. The kitchen is fully equipped for light or full dining having all the  amenities for a great stay including dishwasher, refrigerator, oven and cook top, ice maker and wine cooler.  3 large luxury bedrooms consisting of the master bedroom with queen size bed, LCD TV and a walk in en-suite with full bath tub and separate shower.  The second bedroom contains a double bed and en-suite with shower and the third bedroom contains a double bed with a separate bathroom that can also be used for other guests.. The leather lounge suites offer a great place to relax while enjoying the large screen TV
properties.neighborhood_overview: The apartment borders the hip Prenzlauer Berg area but with extremely close proximity to the centre of the city.  With plenty of green spaces, cafe's and restaurants in the local surroundings, the convenient subway Ubahn at the building entrance provides an excellent transport link for exploring the whole city.  Because your stay is extremely central, being part of this experience means there will always be some ambient city noise when doors/windows are open. Mitte’s hotspots for culture and nightlife, Berlin's gallery area, such as hip Hackescher Markt and Oranienburger Straße, Museum Island and the state Opera are only a short distance away.  You won't find a more central, luxury and convenient location to enjoy your stay in Berlin with two convenient supermarkets within 400 metres of the apartment.
properties.notes: All our calendars are kept up-to-date. The apartment has fans but does NOT have air-conditioning. Eye masks are provided in the apartment particularly over Summer with its roof position and large windows.
properties.transit: 1 underground secure car space available with apartment.  Please contact us for additional spaces. Please do not park your car on any other parking space than the ones we show you. If you fail to oblige, your car might be removed at your own cost.  Naturkundenmuseum Ubahn station(underground) station located at front door of building with elevator.  2 stops to Friedrichstrasse Train station. 25 minute walk to Brandenburg Gate.  25 minutes by taxi to Tegel Airport.
properties.access: The apartment includes free wifi access with dedicated modem, bedding and towels, a hair dryer, shower gel, dishwashing tabs and washing up liquid. The apartment has a convenient washing machine and dryer plus a separate drying stand particularly suited for longer staying guests.  If you require a baby bed please contact us prior to confirm.
properties.interaction: We meet all our guests at the apartment address.  It´s important that you contact us prior to arrival to ensure a smooth check-in as we do not live at the property.  During check-in we will provide you with a city map and are more than happy to answer any questions you have including local supermarkets, great eateries, sightseeing and public transport.   Please note any check-in´s between 9.30pm and Midnight attract a 20 euro surcharge payable in cash on check-in.  Check-ins after midnight are not possible.
properties.house_rules: Check-ins after midnight are not possible. Check-in´s between 9.30pm and Midnight attract a 20 euro surcharge payable in cash on check-in.   No smoking inside the apartment. Quiet from 10pm each night. Please send us your arrival details (by air, car or train) as soon as you have them in order to ensure a smooth check-in. Once you arrive in Berlin please contact us to re-confirm a meeting time at the apartment 60 minutes prior to arrival. Absolutely no more guests permitted to stay than what have been booked for. Early check-ins possible before 3pm but please contact us first. Late check-outs after 10am may be possible but please contact us first.
properties.host_about:
English/Deutsch/Francais

Hi, we are a family operated apartment management business located in the Berlin suburb of Prenzlauer Berg.  We manage apartments on behalf of owners when they are not in town.  All of our apartments are located in central Berlin with easy access to public transport, supermarkets and local eateries.  We are always at close hand if you have any issues.  Our apartments are well maintained, secure, kept in clean order and we include all bedding, towels, shower soap and importantly hair dryers!  Free Wifi and a washing machine are standard in every apartment for your convenience.  Please feel free to check-out our past guest reviews, we endeavour to make your stay as comfortable as possible. If you have any questions at all please do not hesitate to contact us.  We look forward to your visit!
_______________________________________________________________
Hallo, wir sind ein Familienunternehmen mit Sitz im Prenzlauer Berg und spezialisieren uns auf die Betreuung von Wohnungen. Alle unsere Wohnungen befinden sich im Zentrum von Berlin mit guter Anbindung an den öffentlichen Verkehr, Supermärkte und Restaurants. Sollte es Probleme geben, sind wir immer in der Nähe. Alle Wohnungen sind gut instandgehalten und legen großen Wert auf Sauberkeit. Bettwäsche, Handtücher, Duschgel und ein Fön sind in jeder einzelnen Wohnung standardmäßig enthalten. Zudem stehen auch in jeder Wohnung kostenloses WLAN und eine eigene Waschmaschine zur Verfügung. In unseren Gästebewertungen könnt Ihr sehen, dass wir Euren Aufenthalt so angenehm wie möglich machen wollen. Bei Fragen könnt Ihr uns jederzeit kontaktieren. Wir freuen uns auf Euren Besuch!
_______________________________________________________________
Salut! Nous sommes une entreprise familiale, spécialisée en louer des appartements de vacances dans le centre de Berlin. Tous nos appartements se trouvent dans le centre ville à proximité des transports en commun, des supermarchés et des restaurants. S`il y a des problèmes, nous sommes tout près. Nous entretenons tous les appartements et nous faisons attention, qu`ils sont bien nettoyés. Des housses, des serviettes, du gel douche et bien sur un sèche-cheveux sont inclus dans chaque appartement. En plus, il y a un accès à internet gratuit et une lave-linge. Veuillez vous référer à nos excellents commentaires clients, car nous essayons de faire votre séjour le plus confortable. Si vous avez des questions, vous pouvez nous bien contacter. Nous nous réjouissions à votre séjour dans un de nos appartements!

properties.space: A two room apartment, 87mq, 1st floor (belle etage), loads of light, in a building  built in the late 1800'. Also there are plenty reading or illustrated books in English and Italian. It is situated in the hart of Kreuzberg, right next to Oranienstrasse and the canal. The metro station is 1 minute walk- U1 Görlitzer Bahnhof. Bellow there are plenty of cute restaurants and bars and on the same building there is a bike rental shop that could always be handy to visitors.

properties.name: Perfect Place @ Gendarmenmarkt
properties.summary: Das Apartment ist perfekt für 2 – 3 Erwachsene. Es gibt ein Schlafzimmer mit einem Bett und eine ausziehbare Couch auf der 1-2 Person drauf schlafen können. Außerdem gibt es einen schönen großen Balkon.
properties.space: Das Apartment ist perfekt für 2 – 3 Erwachsene. Es gibt ein Schlafzimmer mit einem Bett und eine ausziehbare Couch auf der auch wunderbar zwei Personen drauf schlafen können. Außerdem gibt es einen schönen großen Balkon. Besser liegen kann eine Wohnung in Berlin fast gar nicht. Man ist innerhalb von 5min (400m) mitten am Gendarmenmarkt und/oder an der Friedrichstraße die zum Shoppen einlädt. Auch die Mall of Berlin ist innerhalb von 15min Fußweg gut erreichbar. Der legendäre CHECKPOINT CHARLIE ist in nicht einmal 5 min zu Fuß erreicht. Ein kleiner Supermarkt und eine Bäckerei, sowie diverse Restaurants befinden sich ebenfalls in der Nachbarschaft. Zum U-Bahnhof „Stadtmitte“ läuft man ca. 5min.  Die Wohnung verfügt über einen High-Speed Internetanschluss.  * Please behave as if it would be your own flat. Don´t be loud in the night or pollute something. Parties are also forbidden. *

properties.space: There is a more than queen size bed (160cm / 5'4" wide), a wardrobe, a desk with chairs, and a couch for you to use.

Since I work a lot, I'm rarely home and that´s why I offer a room to rent of my beautiful 2-bedroom apartment, right in the center of my favorite city Berlin

properties.name: Stylish flat in popular Neukölln
properties.summary: Our 56 m2 flat consists of one bedroom with a double bed and a big living room with a comfortable fold-out couch that fits 2 people as well. We have a nice little balcony up the 3rd floor and a very modern kitchen with dishwasher and a table that fits up to 4 people. The flat is situated in a quiet area in popular Neukölln and its interiour is a mix between modern and vintage styles.
properties.space: Our apartment has recently been renovated and is very modern with a very trendy interior. The big bathroom has a bath tub with shower and a mirror with good light for putting on make up. The kitchen has a dishwasher and a cooking area with stove, oven and microwave. From the kitchen goes the balcony where you can relax in the sun all day. The bedroom has a very comfortable double bad and enough space to store all your luggage. The living room is nice and sunny and very quiet to sleep in. The interior here includes a big TV, a bench at the window and a dining table that fits a minimum of 4 people.

properties.neighborhood_overview: The appartment is situated in the very trendy eastern district Neukölln. Our street is very quiet but close to some popular areas like famous Weserstraße or Schiller Kiez with a variety of bars and restaurants. Also the old abandoned airport at the Tempelhofer Feld is just 15 minutes walk from our flat. Public transport is very close and brings you to all of Berlin's famous nightlife and culture areas in Mitte, Kreuzberg, Friedrichshain and Neukölln in maximum 20 minutes.
properties.transit: There is a S Bahn and U Bahn station with all the main train lines just 7 minutes walk from our door. There also is a bus station right in front of the house.
properties.access: You have access to the bathroom, kitchen and balcony.
properties.interaction: I'm only renting out the flat when we're on holiday so I won't be around while you're staying at our place. Of course I'd like to meet you in person for your check in and check out.
properties.house_rules: Of course I wish my guests to be careful and tidy with the use of my interior. I would appreciate a respectful behavior regarding my private belongings. Please no pets and no smoking inside. You can smoke outside on the balcony out the kitchen. When I'm not at home, I expect you to lock the door and switch off all electricity and lights when you leave the flat.
properties.host_about:
Hi I'm Julia. I'm 27 years old and work as a PR and social media manager at a livestyle PR Agency in Berlin Mitte. I love doing fitness, eating out, drinking a glas of wine on the balcony at night and having a relaxing day out at a park or surrounding Berlin/Brandenburg. But of course there are many bars, clubs and open airs to experience in Berlin so I'm always down for some Berlin Electro Sound.

Through my travels especially in the USA and Australia I've met many awesome people from all over the world and I'd love to spend some time with people that are travelling for the same experience. I'm open minded and communicative and happy to help with any questions on stuff to do and getting around in Berlin.

properties.name: Beautiful brandnew 3 room apartment
properties.summary: This warm colorful and stylish flat is located at the quiet river-shore in the most green, beautiful and hip part of Kreuzberg. Enjoy the comfort of a fully equipped open kitchen in a big living room, 2 brand-new spacious bathrooms and bedrooms.
properties.space: This lovely decorated apartment is full of charm and color! There are two bedrooms and a spacious living room with a completely calm and cosy atmosphere. The king size-sofa measures 4m and it can be used as a bed, if there are more than 6 people staying.  The very well equipped kitchen includes a Nespresso coffee machine and a dish washer. There is a high quality bathroom with a perfect bath tub and an extra bathroom with a shower.  The bathrooms includes enough fresh towels for your stay. Each of the 2 cosy bedrooms is equipped with a king-size-bed, a single bed, a huge closet and a flat-screen-tv. All rooms have a very warm lightening and most of the lights can be dimmed. In the backyard of the house is place for children to play, with a sandbox and a swing. Pets and children are very welcome!
properties.description: This warm colorful and stylish flat is located at the quiet river-shore in the most green, beautiful and hip part of Kreuzberg. Enjoy the comfort of a fully equipped open kitchen in a big living room, 2 brand-new spacious bathrooms and bedrooms. This lovely decorated apartment is full of charm and color! properties.neighborhood_overview: The apartment is located in a really nice street by the Spree Canal. You will have the opportunity to enjoy a nice walk, hear some street music and buy fresh fruit and vegetables at the Turkish market a few meters ahead. The nearest subway station is Schönleinstrasse, less than 10 minutes walking from the apartment. Around the neighborhood you will find lots of good restaurants, bars and clubs, as this is one of the most vibrant neighborhood of Berlin. Familiys can find a beautiful big playground very close.
properties.notes: Here is a (SENSITIVE CONTENTS HIDDEN)-maps-link, where you can find my recommendations of restaurants, bars, supermarkets, outside activities, metro stations, and more : (URL HIDDEN)
properties.transit: There are 3 trains stations in 7 minutes walking distance. U8 Schönleinstrasse U8/U1 Kottbusser Tor U1 Prinzenstrasse With the U8 you are in Mitte in 12 minutes. The U1 goes to Chalottenburg (Kurfürstendamm in 15 min.) or Friedrichshain (7min.)
properties.access: The apartment will be used only by the guests.
properties.interaction: Because I live around the corner I can be there for the guests any time and help with all kinds of questions.  Specially for families with children I have solutions for all kinds of problems because I also have children.
properties.house_rules: I don't like to have partys in the place.  If you like to smoke you can do that outside but you have to make sure to be quite at night (after 8pm). If you like to talk loud you can to walk 10 meters and sit by the river. Its beautiful there and you can be as loud as you like. :-) Please don`t play loud music at night. Pets are allowed.
properties.host_about:
I am an architect and I live with my family (husband, 2 children and 2 cats) very close from the apartment.
The flat has been bought, renovated, furnished and decorated by me, in purpose of renting it. It has been finished october 2014.

properties.name: Bright Spot in the East of the city
properties.summary: Meine Gäste haben ein eigenes, großes  und helles Zimmer für sich (1-2  für Pers. + Notbett)  mit freiem W-LAN. Wir teilen uns die Küche, die ihr gerne nutzen könnt, und das Bad. Von meiner Wohnung  kannst du zu Fuß zum belebten Prenzlauer Berg spazieren. Einkaufsmöglichkeiten liegen in 200m Entfernung. In 5-10 Gehminuten erreicht man verschiedenste öffentliche Verkehrsmittel, die einen direkt oder mit 1x Umsteigen überall hin bringen.
properties.space: After visiting Berlin many times, I'm happy to call myself a yearlong resident. Now I am excited about my small but lovely apartment. It's located in Pankow; close to all the action, yet quiet enough to recharge after a long day of exploration. Grocery stores are a block away and more shopping is just around the corner on Schönhauser Allee and Stargrader Str. Aside from organic supermarkets, book stores and other essential shops you'll find plenty of restaurants, bars and nightlife. A visit to the old and traditional Bäckerei S. is a must. My guests are welcome to feel at home and enjoy the comfort of wifi, a washing machine and a dishwasher. While there is no TV (but cable) in the apartment, you're invited to connect your laptop to my projector. The central station and airport are both easily accessible through public transportation. The tram 12, 13 as well as M1 and M2 are close by and the subway line U2 and the Ringbahn express trains are only 7 minutes away. Parking is typically al

The tram 12, 13 as well as M1 and M2 are close by and the subway line U2 and the Ringbahn express trains are only 7 minutes away. Parking is typically al
properties.neighborhood_overview: Meine Nachbarschaft ist eine reine Wohngegend und dennoch in Fußnähe zu den belebteren Straßen des Prenzlauer-Berg-Viertels. Lebensmittel kann man einen Häuserblock weiter in zwei Supermärkten erwerben. Alle anderen Dinge des täglichen Lebens erhält man auf der nächsten Einkaufsstraße (Schönhauser Allee) in 800m Entfernung.
properties.notes: Walli, mein Mischlingshund lebt seit 12.16 bei mir . Damit die Gäste ungestört sind, darf sie das Gästezimmer nicht betreten. Auch wenn keine Gäste da sind. Im Flur oder in meinem Zimmer kann man sie natürlich gerne begrüßen. Walli und ich absolvieren eine Ausbildung zum Mensch-Hund-Team, damit sie mich bei meiner Arbeit als Sonderpädagogin bald unterstützen kann. Sollte sie mich mal nicht begleiten können, bleibt sie ruhig in ihrer Box in meinem Zimmer.
properties.transit: Vom Flughafen Tegel nimmt man am besten den Bus 128 bis Osloer Str. dort steigt man in die Tram M13 und fährt bis zur Haltestelle Wisbyer/Stahlheimer Str. (8 Stationen). Vom Flughafen Schönefeld steigt man in die S9, fährt bis Schönhauser Allee (15 Stationen) . Dort bitte den hinteren Ausgang nehmen und links in die Greifenhagener Str. einbiegen. Über die Wisbyer Str., leicht rechts die Baumbachstr und an der zweiten Kreuzung rechts in die Thulestr. (insgesamt 900m) Von meiner Wohnung aus in fußläufiger Entfernung kommt man mit der M1, M2, M12, U2 und der Ringbahn problemlos überall hin.
properties.access: Bad und Küche teilen wir, wenn ich zu Hause bin. Meine Gäste können alle Haushaltsgeräte gerne benutzen, die Kaffeemaschine im Gästezimmer steht zur freien Verfügung. Und gerne kannst die zahlreichen Tees (hinter der Schiebetür zur Küche) genießen. Im Bad ist ein Fön und gerne dürfen das Shampoo usw. mit benutzt werden.
properties.interaction: Für Fragen stehe ich gern zur Verfügung!
properties.house_rules: Sei herzlich eingeladen, die Wohnung wie ein Gast zu genießen. Handtücher und Bettwäsche stelle ich selbstverständlich zur Verfügung. Im Bad stehen die notwendigsten Utensilien für dich bereit . Da ich nicht rauche, bitte ich, zum Rauchen in den Hof zu gehen. Falls irgendetwas kaputt geht, bitte Bescheid sagen. Meine Nachbarn sind alle sehr freundlich und hilfsbereit. Wäre schön, wenn das so bleiben kann und sie nicht durch Lärm oder andere Vorkommnisse verärgert werden. Be welcome to enjoy my place as a guest. Towels an bedsheets are provided. Please don't smoke. If something is broken, just tell me. We will find a way to fix it.  My neighbors are very friendly and I would be glad, if it stays like that and you will take care that they are not disturbed by noise or other uncomfortable things. Thank you.
properties.host_about:
Hallo, liebe Gäste,
ab Januar 2016 wird Walli, ein Mischlingswelpe bei mir einziehen. Sie wird mich mit zu meiner Arbeit als Sonderschullehrerin begleiten und wohlerzogen sein.
Mein Gästezimmer wird hundefrei gehalten und Walli wird nur auf wunsch Kontakt zu euch haben.


Meine überaus positiven Erfahrungen als Gast bei Airbnb bewegten mich 2012 dazu, meine Wohnung auch für Reisende zur Verfügung zu stellen. Es ist mir eine Freude, mein Zimmer -und wer möchte- auch meinen Alltag mit anderen zu teilen. Gerne bin ich behilflich, sich in der Stadt zu orientieren und wohl zu fühlen.

Das Zimmer hat einen eigenen Zugang, Bad und Küche teilen wir.
Ich freue mich auf euch
Sonja


Als Gast bin ich recht genügsam und komme gut mit den unterschiedlichsten Begebenheiten zurecht.

properties.name: BIG room in P.Berg,private bathroom
properties.summary: The room is in a 1893 historical building and the apartment has 2 bathrooms, a kitchen and living room. Centrally located in Prenzlauer Berg, Berlin's most beautiful area, in a quiet street w/ nice restaurants, cafés and lots of green!
properties.space: You will have an entire room plus the common areas at your disposal (two bathrooms and a kitchen). Wireless internet is of course included, we have a cable connection which is very fast (about 20Mbs in up/download). The password is written on the fridge. There is a TVs in the apartment (with complimentary Netflix) where you can watch numerous international channels and to which you can connect your computer to watch movies or videos with the HDMI and mini-display port connectors provided.
properties.description: The room is in a 1893 historical building and the apartment has 2 bathrooms, a kitchen and living room. Centrally located in Prenzlauer Berg, Berlin's most beautiful area, in a quiet street w/ nice restaurants, cafés and lots of green! You will have an entire room plus the common areas at your disposal (two bathrooms and a kitchen). Wireless internet is of course included, we have a cable connection which is very fast (about 20Mbs in up/download). The password is written on the fridge. There is a TVs in the apartment (with complimentary Netflix) where you can watch numerous international channels and to which you can connect your computer to watch movies or videos with the HDMI and mini-display port connectors provided. The bedroom is fully furnished, with loads of wardrobe space, and a big 140cm bed ideal for 1 or 2 people + a child (who can use the armchair that pulls out into a bed) The kitchen is also at your disposal. Pots, pans, etc. are easy to find. Just make yourself at home :
properties.neighborhood_overview: The area is one of the most trendy neighborhoods in Berlin, with lots of shops, bars and nice restaurants, all reachable by foot; we can provide you with list of the best places to eat and/or have a drink, please just ask (or check the guidebook in our profile). The area is very quite and green, with a few cars passing by; it's also very safe (thanks to the two police stations in the area). In front of the house there is a church famous for having been the place where the peaceful revolution started (don't worry, the bell rings only during the day ;) Mauerpark, also known as („wallpark” because of the Wall which passed through it) is just 20 minutes away, there you can relax or visit the famous flee market on Sunday. In the area you can find several shops and supermarkets: - mini-market next to our place, on the left - Supermarket, postoffice and several shops in the Schönhauser Arkaden mall (5 minutes from home, behind the church on the left) - Kaiser's (supermarket), Pappelallee 45 (
properties.notes: When booking please let us know your arrival and departure times, so that we can organize it accordingly. Check-in is after 15:00 and check-out is before 12:00 (noon), but we are flexible according to the availability (if there is no other guest coming you can stay until the afternoon and arrive in the morning). So let us know before you arrive so that we can find a solution which is best for you!
properties.transit: The apartment is 10-15 minutes from the center (Alexander Platz and the television tower, an ideal point to start exploring the city), reachable by subway (S-Bahn and U-Bahn Schönhauser Allee), tram, bus all 3 minutes away by foot.  Airports are conveniently reachable: Schönefeld is directly connected to the line S9 (S-Bahn) and Tegel by S41/42 + bus TXL. The main station (Hauptbahnhof) is connected to U2 to Alexander Platz + any S-Bahn going westward. If you want to rent bikes, at the corner with Greifenhagener Straße (one minute walk when leaving the apartment on the left), you can find some for a decent price; just ask in the café Gina M. Really, you couldn't find a place strategically better positioned in Berlin!
properties.access: The bedroom is fully furnished, with loads of wardrobe space, and a big 140cm bed ideal for 1 or 2 people + a child (who can use the armchair that pulls out into a bed) The kitchen is also at your disposal. Pots, pans, etc. are easy to find. Just make yourself at home :) You have  space in the fridge and in the cupboards to store your stuff. You can also use the oven and microwave. We also have a washing machine + dryer which can be used as well. Towels and bedsheets are included.
properties.interaction: We will welcome you and hand-over the keys; in case we will be traveling, the cleaning lady will do the same. If you have any questions,we are always available via telephone or email, and we get back to you in a matter of minutes!
properties.house_rules: You will be provided with a copy of the house keys, so you can come and go when you please. Out of respect for others guests we don't allow smoking in the apartment (it's super convenient to smoke in the yard or in the front of the house). Please note that there is a smoke detector in each room of the apartment. Small size pets are allowed, so please leave your Saint Bernard at home ;)
properties.host_about:
We are a friendly couple who would be glad to rent our 90 sqm flat (about 960 sqft) to people traveling to Berlin :)
We are working for an internet startup and we would be more then happy to advise you about the best activities in the city and help you have a great time in one of the most vibrant capital cities in Europe.

properties.name: Luxury Artist Loft
properties.summary: Discover. Relax. Work.
properties.space: Welcome to my very cool, calm and tranquil loft, located in one of the most happening destinations in central Berlin.  My second Berlin home I love living in this amazing former industrial space. The conversion blends manmade materials with the natural warmth of steel beams, brickwork and floors. I wanted to retain the sense of open space and design a home which had flexibility and practicality – excellent storage, privacy if needed, dining, relaxing and work spaces. The flat offers a spacious living room with a fully equipped kitchen, two separate bedrooms, two bathrooms (one with shower, one with bath tub) and a large heated winter garden on a constructed area of 130 square meters (1.400 sq ft). The apartment has really thick ceilings and floors that provide sound insulation from the neighbors, making it absolute quiet all day and night. - 55' brand new Samsung HDTV with hundreds of national and international channels - Sonos sound system! Just download the app and you will have acce

properties.neighborhood_overview: Bordering the Prenzlauer Berg and Mitte neighborhoods minutes from Alexanderplatz and Museum Island , this loft-style building is centrally located to just about everything and offers tons of space and privacy.  Blocks away from several cinemas, super markets (opening hours from 7 a.m. to midnight) drug stores, countless great bars and restaurants, galleries etc.
properties.transit: Tram to Alexanderplatz right in front of the building. Subway lines and S-Bahn in walking distance, several citibike stations around. Walk, bike, bus, train, subway, uber, rental car - you name it! You can walk to Berlin Mitte in 10-15 minutes! That's the benefit of being right in the middle of central Berlin.
properties.access: + High-speed Wireless Internet (50 MBit/s) + Brand new 55' Samsung HDTV + Hundreds of national and international channels + Pay TV: Sky Welt HD + Sky Bundesliga HD and Sport HD (Champions League, Premier League, Primera Division!) + Fully equipped Kitchen + Italian Coffee Machine for perfect Cappuccino + Washing machine, dryer
properties.interaction: I am local and available for requests and to make your stay as pleasant as possible. Please let me know if you have any questions!
